alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 14 at 9:13AM CDT until March 16 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Carthage. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of low areas along and near the river is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest this morning and should begin falling later today. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Pearl River Carthage 17.0 17.9 Mon 8 am CDT 17.3 15.7 13.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued tonight at 7 pm CDT.
